00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     FILE* boot;
00028     unsigned char bootcode[1024];
00029  
00030     boot=fopen(argv[1],"rb");
00031     if (!boot) {
00032         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00033         exit(1);
00034     }
00035     fread(bootcode, sizeof(unsigned char), 1024, boot);
00036     fclose(boot);
00037 
00038     adfEnvInitDefault();
00039 
00040     hd = adfMountDev(argv[2],FALSE);
00041     if (!hd) {
00042         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00043         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00044     }
00045     
00046     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00047     if (!vol) {
00048         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00049         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00050         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00051     }
00052 
00053     adfInstallBootBlock(vol, bootcode);
00054 
00055     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00056 
00057     adfUnMount(vol);
00058     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00059 
00060     adfEnvCleanUp();
00061 
00062     return 0;
00063 }
